body:
### Describe the bug

Hi there,

For some reason, I really want my pyx to be compiled together within a single .so file.
This is how I achieve that: https://github.com/DearCyGui/DearCyGui/blob/21fc3ac23297d046ecbc8b4330e06873c58ce1b8/setup.py#L289

It works well with Cython 3.0 up to 3.1.1. However the build with 3.1.2 now fails.

Tested with python 3.13 and python 3.13t.

How to reproduce:
```
git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/DearCyGui/DearCyGui/
cd DearCyGui
python setup.py build_ext --inplace
```

The failure message is:
```
ccache g++ -fno-strict-overflow -Wsign-compare -Wunreachable-code -DNDEBUG -g -O3 -Wall -fPIC -pthread -shared -Wl,--exclude-libs,ALL -LModules/_hacl build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/backends/imgui_impl_opengl3.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/backends/imgui_impl_sdl3.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/backends/sdl3_gl3_backend.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/core.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/dearcygui.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/draw.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/draw_helpers.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/font.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/handler.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/imgui.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/imgui_types.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/layout.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/os.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/plot.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/table.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/texture.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/theme.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/types.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/widget.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/gl3w/GL/gl3w.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/imgui.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/imgui_demo.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/imgui_draw.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/imgui_tables.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/imgui_widgets.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/misc/cpp/imgui_stdlib.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/imgui/misc/freetype/imgui_freetype.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/implot/implot.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/implot/implot_demo.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/thirdparty/implot/implot_items.o /home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/build_SDL/libSDL3.a /home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/build_FT/libfreetype.a -L/home/axel/.local/share/uv/python/cpython-3.13.5+freethreaded-linux-x86_64-gnu/lib -lcrypt -lpthread -ldl -lutil -lm -lGL -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/dearcygui.cpython-313t-x86_64-linux-gnu.so -O3
/usr/bin/ld : build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/dearcygui.o : dans la fonction « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) » :
/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/dearcygui.cpp:5915 : définitions multiples de « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) »; build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/core.o:/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/core.cpp:118880 : défini pour la première fois ici

/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/layout.cpp:46631 : définitions multiples de « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) »; build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/core.o:/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/core.cpp:118880 : défini pour la première fois ici

/usr/bin/ld : build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/plot.o : dans la fonction « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) » :
/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/plot.cpp:83053 : définitions multiples de « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) »; build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/core.o:/home/axel/Source/DearCyGui/dearcygui/core.cpp:118880 : défini pour la première fois ici
/usr/bin/ld : build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313t/dearcygui/table.o : dans la fonction « __pyx_CommonTypesMetaclass_get_module(_object*, void*) » :
```

comment_data.body: This was fixed in https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/6957 so will be fixed in the next release. Thanks for the report

title: [BUG] regression on 3.1.2 for multiple pyx compilation
